railway.network

Class Journey

  • java.lang.Object
    • railway.network.Journey

  • public class Journey
extends java.lang.Object

    A Journey is a collection of Routes which are connected to each other in sequence.

    This class ensures any Routes added to a Journey are adjoining.

        public Journey()

      • Journey

        public Journey(java.util.ArrayList<Route> routes)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        routes - A list of Routes in which the destination of each Route should be the same as the source of the next Route.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the list of Routes provided is not connected.

      • Journey

        public Journey(Route... routes)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        routes - An array of Routes in which the destination of each Route should be the same as the source of the next Route.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the array of Routes provided is not conencted.

    • Method Detail

      • validNextRoute

        public boolean validNextRoute(Route route)

        Check if the given Route would be accepted as the next Route in this Journey.

        Parameters:
        route - Route to check
        Returns:
        true if the source of the new Route matches the destination of the final Route in this Journey or if there are no Routes in the Journey yet

      • setRoutes

        public void setRoutes(java.util.ArrayList<Route> routes)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Set the Routes from a given list, ensuring each Route is connected to the next.

        Parameters:
        routes - List of Routes to set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the destination of a Route does not match the source of the next.

      • getRoutes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getRoutes()

        Get the list of Routes that make up this Journey.

        Returns:
        a list of Routes

      • addRouteToJourneyEnd

        public boolean addRouteToJourneyEnd(Route route)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Add a new Route to the end of the Journey.

        Parameters:
        {@link - Route} to add.
        Returns:
        true if it is added successfully
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the new Route's source does not match the destination of the last Route in the list.

      • addRouteToJourneyStart

        public void addRouteToJourneyStart(Route route)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Add a new Route to the start of the Journey.

        Parameters:
        route - Route to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the new Route's destination does not match the source of the first Route in the list.

      • removeRouteFromJourneyEnd

        public void removeRouteFromJourneyEnd()

        Remove Route from end of Journey.
